name: Cute Capybaras
description:
Capybaras are cutest and biggest rodent on our planet! They are 100% vegetarians who likes to swum in the water. Capybara’s eyes and ears are positioned high on the head, so they can see and hear easily while swimming. Capybaras also have webbing between their fingers and toes, which helps them dive and swim.

These magnificent, wonderful, sociable, good-natured animals will help you and your children in training your memory, intellect and concentration.

Carefully examine pictures and find all differences amongst them. You can mark the difference on any picture.

Enjoy pictures of beautiful capybaras and train your memory with all your family!

Features:
* 10 levels.
* Beautiful artworks.
* Relaxing music.
* Casual gameplay.
* Simple control by mouse.
* Achievements.
* Game suited for all ages.
